summary: Bootstrap, gatekeeper, or critical directory preparation failed.
Homebrew tap/install step failed or brew environment is unhealthy.
Shell configuration or profile synchronisation did not complete.
Python environment provisioning, dependency resolution, or venv activation failed.
Language runtime or toolchain installation failed (Node, Rust, Go, JVM, etc.).
Database service bootstrap or health check failed.
Template synchronisation or workspace scaffolding failed.
System optimisation, cleanup, or power profile adjustments failed.
Validation suite detected runtime or dependency regressions.
Maintenance launchd job provisioning failed or drift detected.
Available disk space is below the recommended threshold.
System memory is below the recommended threshold.
